description: Divide the numbers and get to the 1 tile!

title: 10 Bullets
description: arcade-style game where players are limited to 10 shots to destroy as many enemy ships as possible

title: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
description: arcade-style game where players are limited to 10 shots to destroy as many enemy ships as possible

title: 10-103 Null Kevin
description: a 2021 two-dimensional, side-scrolling action-horror game developed by Nerdspartan that serves as a sequel to their earlier work, 10-103

title: 12 Mini Battles
description: 1v1 local multiplayer games where players compete in a variety of challenges like sports, racing, and combat to be declared the champion

title: 1 On 1 Soccer
description: a one-on-one confrontation between a single attacker and a single defender

title: 1 On 1 Tennis
description: one player on each side of the net hits the ball back and forth over the net until a point is scored

title: 1v1 lol
description: a fast-paced, free-to-play multiplayer battle royale game available on web browsers, mobile, and PC that combines shooting and building mechanics in a competitive environment

title: 1v1 lol (2)
description: a free-to-play, fast-paced online third-person shooter that combines gunplay with tactical building

title: 2048 CupCakes
description: a puzzle game where players match identical cupcake tiles on a grid to create higher-value, more elaborate cupcakes, aiming to reach the ultimate 2048 cupcake

title: 2Doom
description: a fan-made, 2D demake of the classic video game, offering a pixel-art, intense adventure in the DOOM universe

title: Shooter 2D Online
description: A 2D online shooter is a multiplayer game where players compete in a two-dimensional space, either with a side-scrolling or top-down perspective. Players typically use a variety of weapons to eliminate opponents and complete objectives in different game modes

title: 3Dash
description: a 3D auto-scrolling rhythm platformer game, similar to Geometry Dash, but with a unique 3D perspective and an advanced level editor

title: 3 Slices 2
description: a puzzle game where the player uses three 'slices' to cut apart and remove designated blocks (red and blue) from a screen into a pit, with inverted gravity for blue blocks
